NOTES:
This is a mixture of all the releases to date :lol:
The intro&#039;s are mixed up of the russian cam and ndn&#039;s cam
The main body of the film is the hungarian cam
And the ending is taken from the russian cam
Only way to get a full version and synced nicely.......
For a cam this is great specially the hungarian source......however it does have a problem
the hungarian cam goes weird...now and again it&#039;s hard to explain....but you&#039;ll see what i mean.
Audio is ndn&#039;s and sounds great for a cam...

There is also a couple of slight camera movement and a top of a head in the bottom left corner....but that doesn&#039;t last long.

WORK DONE:
Where do i start.....firstly i had to strip the audio of ndn&#039;s release and save that....
Then it was a case of taking the unversial intro off the russian cam and the marvel off ndn&#039;s cam and use them has the intro....
Then i added the hungarian cam ....for the body of the film and finally needed to add the last 5 mins or so off the russian cam for the
ending.
All videos have been slightly tweaked here and there...nothing major but they look better now (so i think).
Once done i noticed the audio runtime was shorter then the film but yet they start at the same place and end at the same place.....
well to solve that problem i had to use sony sound forge and stretch the audio to have the same runtime has the video....
Then i had to mux the audio and video togther....but they were still slightly out of sync.....so i needed to crop the film into 8 files and slightly
change the audio gap each time......ranging from 5200-7500ms.

Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON&#039;T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME
HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5&#039;S....BECAUSE THEY DON&#039;T!!!!!

Anyway enjoy the movie,it&#039;s free!!!!
